articles.title: Boston man charged after allegedly stealing more than $55K in merchandise from multiple Targets
articles.description:
A 54-year-old man was caught allegedly trying to make off with 27 bottles of lotion from the South Bay Plaza Target.

The post Boston man charged after allegedly stealing more than $55K in merchandise from multiple Targets appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Victims of Central Mass. crash IDed as 19- and 20-year-old men
articles.description:
The two young men, one from Gardner and the other from Winchendon, died in a crash the day after Christmas.

The post Victims of Central Mass. crash IDed as 19- and 20-year-old men appeared first on Boston.com.
